Plot: Condemned to death to salvage her family's honor, a young rape victim escapes to a seaside town with the man tasked with her execution.
Title: Bliss
Writer: Elif Ayan, Zülfü Livaneli (novel), Abdullah Oguz, Kubilay Tunçer, Sirri Süreyya Önder (adaptation)
Actors: Özgü Namal, Talat Bulut, Murat Han, Mustafa Avkiran
